Heartbleed
Team 50s 3307 Group Project. A platformer game where you, the user, is spawned in as a computer bug with the goal of infiltrating and infecting the computer system. Navigate through the terrain, avoid/defeat enemies, enjoy a beautiful soundtrack and attempt to conquer the final boss.

Detailed Description

Represents a game stage loaded from a JSON file. Contains tiles, enemies, spawn points, and textures.

bool Stage::loadTexture ( const std::string & textureName,

Loads a texture from file and stores it under the given name.

Loads a texture from file and stores it.

Parameters
textureNameLogical name to store the texture under.
filenamePath to the texture file.
Returns
True if the texture was successfully loaded.
Parameters
textureNameThe key name used to refer to the texture.

Returns
True if successful, false otherwise.
